faq.pageDescription: Get answers to common questions about CS2 and Dota 2 case sites, bonuses, withdrawals, safety, and more. Everything you need to know about skin gaming platforms.
faq.pageKeywords: CS2 case sites FAQ, gaming site questions, skin gambling help, case opening guide, withdrawal FAQ, bonus questions
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about CS2 and Dota 2 case sites, bonuses, withdrawals, and gaming platform safety.
faq.contactDescription: If you can't find the answer you're looking for, feel free to reach out to our team. We're here to help you navigate the world of gaming case sites safely.

whatAreCS2Sites.question: What are CS2 case sites?
whatAreCS2Sites.answer: CS2 case sites are online platforms where you can open virtual cases to win CS2 (Counter-Strike 2) skins and items. These sites simulate the case opening experience from the game with various cosmetic rewards.

areSitesSafe.question: Are these sites safe and legitimate?
areSitesSafe.answer: We only feature verified and licensed platforms that meet strict security standards. All listed sites undergo thorough review processes including security audits, fair play verification, and user feedback analysis.

howBonusesWork.question: How do bonuses work?
howBonusesWork.answer: Most sites offer welcome bonuses ranging from 50% to 500% of your first deposit, plus free spins or cases. Bonuses typically have wagering requirements and specific terms and conditions that vary by platform.

canWithdraw.question: Can I withdraw my winnings?
canWithdraw.answer: Yes, all featured sites support withdrawals to Steam accounts or third-party marketplaces. Withdrawal methods, processing times, and minimum amounts vary by platform. Check each site's specific withdrawal policies.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods are accepted?
paymentMethods.answer: Most sites accept cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Ethereum), Steam items, PayPal, credit cards, and various e-wallets. Payment options vary by platform and region.

howRateSites.question: How do you rate and rank sites?
howRateSites.answer: Our rankings are based on multiple factors including user ratings, security measures, bonus value, withdrawal speed, customer support quality, game variety, and overall user experience.

ageRestrictions.question: Are there age restrictions?
ageRestrictions.answer: Yes, you must be 18 years or older (or the legal gambling age in your jurisdiction) to use these platforms. All reputable sites require age verification during registration.

provablyFair.question: What is provably fair gaming?
provablyFair.answer: Provably fair is a cryptographic system that allows players to verify that game outcomes are random and not manipulated. It provides transparency and ensures fair play on gaming platforms.

mobilePlay.question: Can I play on mobile devices?
mobilePlay.answer: Most modern case sites are optimized for mobile browsers or offer dedicated mobile apps for iOS and Android devices. Mobile gameplay offers the same features as desktop versions.

siteIssues.question: What should I do if I have issues with a site?
siteIssues.answer: First, contact the site's customer support directly. If issues persist, you can report problems to us through our contact form, and we'll investigate and update our reviews accordingly.

responsibleGambling.pageTitle: Responsible Gambling | Safe Gaming Practices | CaseHunters
responsibleGambling.pageDescription: Learn about responsible gambling practices, warning signs of problem gambling, and where to get help. Stay safe while enjoying CS2 and Dota 2 case sites.
responsibleGambling.pageKeywords: responsible gambling, problem gambling help, safe gaming practices, gambling addiction support, gaming site safety
responsibleGambling.title: Responsible Gambling
responsibleGambling.subtitle: Gaming should be fun and entertaining. Learn how to stay safe, set limits, and recognize when gaming becomes a problem.
responsibleGambling.importantAlert: Important: Case opening and skin gambling can be addictive. Only participate if you are 18+ and can afford potential losses.
responsibleGambling.warningSignsDescription: If you or someone you know experiences any of these signs, it may indicate a gambling problem:
responsibleGambling.crisisDescription: If you're experiencing a gambling crisis or having thoughts of self-harm, please reach out for immediate support.

warningSigns.spending: Spending more money than you can afford
warningSigns.neglecting: Neglecting work, family, or social activities

setBudgetLimits.title: Set Budget Limits
setBudgetLimits.description: Only gamble with money you can afford to lose. Never use money intended for bills, rent, or necessities.

timeManagement.title: Time Management
timeManagement.description: Set time limits for gaming sessions and stick to them. Take regular breaks and don't let gaming interfere with daily responsibilities.

useSafetyTools.title: Use Safety Tools
useSafetyTools.description: Take advantage of deposit limits, cooling-off periods, and self-exclusion options offered by gaming platforms.

stayConnected.title: Stay Connected
stayConnected.description: Maintain relationships with family and friends. Don't isolate yourself or let gaming become your primary social activity.

setLimits.title: Set Your Limits
setLimits.description: Before you start gaming, decide on your limits and stick to them:
